title: Increased amount of lag and ping
body: Hey riot, lately I've been getting huge amounts of ping lately. Normally it's only 15 since I live in chicago, but lately it's been reaching 500-20k even. At random times everything will freeze on my screen and it will take about a good 10 seconds (or more depending on how the ping is) for everything to catch up. And since this causes me to frequently dc and rc in the middle of a game, I've received leaver buster punishments for something that isn't my fault. My internet is also fine since I can play other games such as H1z1, Overwatch, WoW ETC. without any lag or problems. If so can someone look into this? I'm not the only one on the boards posting about a lot of lag this patch.

replies.body:
It sounds like your network routing to the server may be really messed up. We can take a look at this by running a traceroute to our test IP. First, grab the network app [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) then plug **104.160.131.1** into the host field before starting the trace. After it has run for 5 minutes, export the results as text and paste them here.

Let me know if you run into issues running that trace.

i checked my error logs and i keep seeing a bunch of these:

DNS name resolution failure (fake-clubs.leagueoflegends.com)

its always around the time i lag spike and dc
I had this exact same problem! It's actually a very easy fix, all you have to do is flush your DNS and it should be fixed!
